article_title: Where Did The Idea Of Obamacare Come From? A Defense Of The Heritage Foundation

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: Where did the idea for managed competition come from? It came from Stanford professor Alain Enthoven, who in 1978 proposed using the federal employee benefits program as a model for a national health care program.
og.title: Where Did The Idea Of Obamacare Come From? A Defense Of The Heritage Foundation
